title: Shell Script
description: This is a shell script that can be used to run a series of funcs in a specific order. It is capable of running multiple funcs in sequence and can be used to orchestrate the execution of multiple funcs in a specific order.

funcs.title: shell-script, edit and execute
funcs.description: Display shell script snippet and allow to execute them in the browser. Use it to display fenced code blocks of the following shell script languages: bash, cmd, powershell, python.

input_schema.title: shell-script

content.description: The content of the shell script snippet

type.description: The type of the shell script snippet content

input_schema.x-prompt:
Prettify the provided script.
The supported shell scripts are: bash, cmd, powershell, python.
Use escape character for new lines, quotes and double quotes.
Example:
{
  "type": "python"
  "content": "print('Hello, World!')",
}
